Beachcomber broke away from his cautious aproach, to a dead sprint
towards the dammaged robot. "Whoooooaaa, this isnt good." he said, to
calmly for the situation. He kneeled, and the held up Redhot's head.
"Tell me, what's wrong? How can I help." He said frantically.
